title: Cannon Sensei Tobashisugi
description:
By chance one day, part time manga artists Runpen Binta and Oozutsu Canon (Yuriko Yayoi) meet their respective heroes whose work they've admired for ages, though they are not whom they thought they were at first.

Codependent upon each other for inspiration and financial security, they work together to improve each other's art and create new stories for their fans.

matches.title: Cannon Sensei Tobashisugi - Female Ero Manga Artist Scorned
Zelda no Densetsu - Medli no Tamago (Doujinshi)
That Slutty Little Testament Form Brat! I Want to Teach Her a Lesson! (Fate/Grand Order)
